TopicTitle: First Major Milestone Reached! 5000 Downloads and counting!

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

Very happy news for us here! The download count has reached (and passed) the 5000 mark!

Not bad at all, considering our best-case prediction was 900 in one full month! (it hasn't been 2 weeks yet)

So I'm really very very happy right now!!! Just wanted to share the good news with everyone, and say a great big [glow=green,2,300]THANK YOU![/glow] for everyone who downloaded the game, and especially all who joined the KSP community and are actively participating and giving feedback!

This has really been an awesome week!

Cheers :cheers:
This is awesome!! We never expected to reach this number of downloads very soon!! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!
I heard about this game on something awful this morning, tons of goons jumping on it. And they tell friends and their friends tell friends... I certainly spammed the game on facebook.
make the download figures go up one,downloaded
I posted this on Something Awful after seeing it mentioned in a shuttle launch discussion. For what it's worth everyone is having a great time with the game so far Thanks!
Someone posted a link in IRC, pure gold. This is an excellent game and I can't wait for more parts.
We should thank YOU (talking to the creators of Kerbals in space), for making this awesome game!
Indeed, this game has already eaten my last three days and probably isn't going to let up that much. Great stuff.
Yea, at least twice recently I've been playing, looked up and gone: 'Is that the time? CRAP!!!'(2-3am)
That's great, I've told a couple of my friends about it too, it more than deserves those download numbers.
